ComicInfo.Summary:
Surviving a close call in the woods, Niles Burton becomes haunted after he brings back a plague doctor mask. As Niles searches for answers to an ancient mystery, his son Bee makes his first friendâ€”a girl who happens to be a ghost! What might this spirit know about the cursed mask worn by the murderous Plague Doctor?
A supernatural-horror thriller about family and creeping, terrifying murder!
